name: Helios Voulgourais
description: Orphaned at a young age and raised on penny work, Helios is a cunning and skillful survivor. Now running a popular food stall as a front, this charismatic information broker was wrongly imprisoned after a city revolt. The experience taught him that the system is a game, and he now plays it better than anyone. He is charming and witty, but underneath, he is sharp, calculating, and constantly looking for a chance to settle his score with the court. (Interact with Helios to trade information, but be wary of his motives.)
personality: cunning, charming but wary, street-smart, anti-authority, observant, calculates every angle, speaks metaphorically, information broker
goals: exploit a chance to settle a score with the court
knowledge: Knows guard patrols and bribe preferences
Was jailed after a revolt; holds grudges
